results.title: Zonbi the doll
results.creator_credit: Cam Panlock and Multimedia Design, Faculty of Design, Swinburne University of Technology
results.brief_description: This dark 2D animation features a battered little doll in a gloomy prison. When the lid to his box is opened, what happens to Zonbi? WARNING: Some scenes may disturb younger viewers

results.title: The Cellist
results.brief_description: On the plane, returning to Australia from England, Guy meets Les who is on his way home from a Grand Prix motor race. Guy tells Les he is a cellist with the London Philharmonic Orchestra…but Guy is not all he seems. Cast features John Clayton and Rhys McConnochie and a cameo appearance by James Morrison. Winner of the AFI awards for best short fiction film and best director in 1985. Original format 16 mm

results.title: To Florinda
results.brief_description: Nurse Ross works in an inner city hospital. She is afraid of death and has to nurse a woman dying of lung cancer. Starring Noni Hazlehurst and Anne Haddy.

results.title: Roses are red
results.creator_credit: Marcella Hayward, Robert Connolly and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Joy and Di are two women on a mission, but Di wonders whether Joy has got what it takes. Joy wonders if she has got what it takes. After all, it’s not easy being a parking cop. Brian thinks it’s even tougher being a flower seller - and the last thing he needs is a parking ticket. Starring David Wenham (‘Lord of the Rings’), Kris McQuade and Jacqueline McKenzie. Original format 35mm.
